channel.title: Stackable?

item.title: Stackable?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

All you have to do is;

itemStackable[itemid] = true/false;

After it loads the 2H weapons in your Item class.

Read full topic

item.title: Stackable?
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

I think that’d be server sided because if it was client sided people could… hack their clients to make items stackable which would probably Disconnect you from the server? (but I’m not sure on that!)!

Read full topic

item.title: Stackable?
item.dc:creator: @sheeba sheeba
item.description:
